alert.note: Alert for Jayuya; Juana Diaz; Penuelas; Ponce; Utuado (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 20 at 5:29PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following: Jayuya, Juana Diaz, Penuelas, Ponce and Utuado. * WHEN...Until 730 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 429 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ponce, Jayuya, Penuelas, Juana Diaz, Utuado, Coto Laurel, Tallaboa Alta, Luis Llorens Torres, Santo Domingo, Aguilita, Guayabal, Capitanejo, Potala Pastillo, Marueno, Tallaboa, Rio Canas Abajo, Cayuco and Playita Cortada. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Jayuya; Juana Diaz; Penuelas; Ponce; Utuado
